Package com.vtls.opensource.text

Interface Summary
Text An interface defining the common Text.getText() method required by all TextSource classes.
 

Class Summary
HTMLTextSource Extracts text from HTML documents.
PDFTextSource Extracts text from PDF documents using the PDFBox library.
RTFTextSource Extracts text from RTF documents.
TextSource Extracts text from plain text documents.
TextSourceFactory An abstraction for all of this package's text-extracting functionality.
WordTextSource Extracts text from Microsoft Word documents using the excellent Textmining library.
XMLTextSource Extracts text from XML documents.
XMLTextSourceExtractionHandler SAX handler that just keeps the text content from an XML document.
